indications.text: relief coughs upper respiratory symptoms , including nasal congestion , associated allergy common cold .

contraindications.text: adults pediatric patients 12 years age : 10 ml ( 2 teaspoonfuls ) every 4 hours . children 6 12 years age : 5 ml ( 1 teaspoonful ) every 4 hours . children 2 6 years age : 2.5 ml ( ½ teaspoonful ) every 4 hours . infants 6 months 2 years age : established physician . exceed 6 doses 24-hour period .

warningsAndPrecautions: brompheniramine maleate , pseudoephedrine hydrochloride dextromethorphan hydrobromide syrup clear , light pink-colored , butterscotch-flavored syrup containing 5 ml ( 1 teaspoonful ) brompheniramine maleate 2 mg , pseudoephedrine hydrochloride 30 mg dextromethorphan hydrobromide 10 mg , available following sizes : 4 fl oz ( 118 ml ) ndc 67877-558-171 pint ( 473 ml ) ndc 67877-558-16 recommended storage store 20 ° 25 °c ( 68 ° 77 °f ) [ usp controlled room temperature ] . keep tightly closed dispense tight , light-resistant container defined usp . rx manufactured : alkem laboratories ltd. , mumbai - 400 013 , india . distributed : ascend laboratories , llc bedminster , nj 07921 revised : january , 2025 pt 2859-02
adverseReactions: hypersensitivity ingredients . newborn , premature infants , nursing mothers , patients severe hypertension severe coronary artery disease . dextromethorphan patients receiving monoamine oxidase ( maoi ) inhibitors ( - ) . antihistamines used treat lower respiratory tract conditions including asthma .
name: Brompheniramine, Pseudoephedrine, Dextromethorphan
indications_original: For relief of coughs and upper respiratory symptoms, including nasal congestion, associated with allergy or the common cold.
contraindications_original:
Adults and pediatric patients 12 years of age and over: 10 mL (2 teaspoonfuls) every 4 hours. Children 6 to under 12 years of age: 5 mL (1 teaspoonful) every 4 hours. Children 2 to under 6 years of age: 2.5 mL (½ teaspoonful) every 4 hours. Infants 6 months to under 2 years of age: Dosage to be established by a physician.
                     Do not exceed 6 doses during a 24-hour period.
warningsAndPrecautions_original:
Brompheniramine maleate, pseudoephedrine hydrochloride and dextromethorphan hydrobromide syrup is a clear, light pink-colored, butterscotch-flavored syrup containing in each 5 mL (1 teaspoonful) brompheniramine maleate 2 mg, pseudoephedrine hydrochloride 30 mg and dextromethorphan hydrobromide 10 mg, available in the following sizes:
                     4 fl oz (118 mL) NDC 67877-558-171 Pint (473 mL) NDC 67877-558-16
                     
                     RECOMMENDED STORAGE
                     
                     Store at 20 ° to 25 °C (68 ° to 77 °F) [See USP Controlled Room Temperature].
                     
                     
                     KEEP TIGHTLY CLOSED
                     Dispense in a tight, light-resistant container as defined in the USP.
                     
                     Rx Only
